title: TokenRoyaltiesMintMsg
description: To allow for royalties to be specified AT TOKEN LEVEL (i.e. different NFTs minted by this contract might have different royalty info), we make some changes to the base MintMsg This, or custom logic like it, should be used in contracts that implement 2981 royalties as defined by the query interface

description.description: Describes the asset to which this NFT represents (may be empty)

image.description: A URI pointing to an image representing the asset

name.description: Identifies the asset to which this NFT represents

owner.description: The owner of the newly minter NFT

royalty_payment_address.description: The address that should be paid the royalty

royalty_payments.description: Whether or not royalties should be paid

royalty_percentage.description: The percentage of sale that is owed note that in future this could be extended to have an additional parameter for e.g. decay so a royalty could decrease over time this is merely the base case
